R

readyToPlay() - Method in interface eftaios.network.rmi.server.ServerInterface
 
readyToPlay() - Method in class eftaios.network.rmi.server.ServerWithRemoteImplementation
Remote method invoked by the user when the connection has estabilished that checks if the total number of players has been reached.
reAssignClientsToPlayes() - Method in class eftaios.network.socket.server.OnlineGame
this method will reassign the connected client to the players of the game so that each client connected as a player inside the game and vice versa before starting the game it is possible that the number of players inside the game is different to the number of clients connected to the game
